channel.title: a dystopian journey into the heart of tech
channel.description: Recent content on a dystopian journey into the heart of tech

item.title: Database Is Sacred
item.description: Database is Sacred: An “Engineer’s” Testament What does the word ‘database’ make you think? It’s probably difficult to generalise, but I’m guessing a good chunk would think of a ‘relational’ flavor? Well, there is no short of ‘flavors’ amongst databases today and I feel like talking about ‘relational’ (or vent about how often relational databases are used against their potential) today. (Relational) Databases are awesome My (not so distant) future self will probably negate this titleüòÅ but, for the point of this blog or the context in my head today, yes - relational databases are awesome.
